channel.title: [SPAWN] Caladrius Pk || Truly Login & Pk || Token Eco|| PvP World
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]Hey guys. I know this server doesn't even compare to the rest. Yes it is new..so that means no players. I would greatly appreciate it if you tried it out. I put a decent amount of effort into this. Even though most of you will say Leach, Boring etc. I'm trying to make a fun Pk Only server for players who enjoy pking. I will add more Zones to Pk when more players arrive but for now the home is good enough. So come and check it out. FYI: Only reason I used Un-Paid hosting is because I don't know how well this server will go. If it does then I will by a paid web host immediately.
All I am looking for a is a decent amount of players and a mature helpful staff. Apologies for the bad web site. It's one page, I will make it better if the server goes well.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://www.cdpk.x10.mx/?234369e8]Play Now[/URL] [/SIZE] But no harm no foul if you don't decide to play. Please remember to give feedback at least on how I can improve. Thank you and hope you join.
Features: [CODE]Instant Switching Castle Wars Center Home Entire Pk World Custom My profile interface Pk Tab Spawn Good Combat Hand Cannon Pk Token Eco - No more Pk points[/CODE] Media: [SIZE=3]Video:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/aazwip/6]Combat Video[/URL]
[SIZE=3]Images:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Switches (Bit Laggy but faster in game) [url=http://gifninja.com/animated-gifs/507984/switches]http://gifninja.com/animated-gifs/507984/switches[/url]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2yjr9j4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2nkt2za.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30kbrc9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2coiiox.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2iqbofc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/28wf87q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zy7eqh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/mloxd.png[/img]

item.description:
@Treason wrote:

[SIZE=4]Hey guys. I know this server doesn’t even compare to the rest. Yes it is new…so that means no players.
I would greatly appreciate it if you tried it out. I put a decent amount of effort into this. Even though most of you will say
Leach, Boring etc. I’m trying to make a fun Pk Only server for players who enjoy pking.
I will add more Zones to Pk when more players arrive but for now the home is good enough.
So come and check it out.
FYI: Only reason I used Un-Paid hosting is because I don’t know how well this server will go. If it does then I will by a paid web host immediately.

All I am looking for a is a decent amount of players and a mature helpful staff.
Apologies for the bad web site. It’s one page, I will make it better if the server goes well.[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=5]Play Now
[/SIZE]
But no harm no foul if you don’t decide to play. Please remember to give feedback at least on how I can improve. Thank you and hope you join.

Features:

Instant Switching Castle Wars Center Home Entire Pk World Custom My profile interface Pk Tab Spawn Good Combat Hand Cannon Pk Token Eco - No more Pk points
